amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the language that would delay the implementation of the new Ozone Standards.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in House Report 115-297 to strike the language that would delay the implementation of the new Ozone Standards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A075) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 218 (Roll no. 476).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
